mapper.sql: course_id, enterprise_id, name, detail, img_url, category_id, release_time, price, status
mapper.insert: insert into course(enterprise_id, name, detail, img_url, category_id, release_time, price, status) values(#{enterpriseId}, #{name}, #{detail}, #{imgUrl}, #{categoryId}, #{releaseTime}, #{price}, #{status})
mapper.select: select crs.course_id, crs.name, crs.detail, crs.img_url, crs.category_id, cat.name 'category_name', crs.release_time, crs.price, crs.status, crsofr.course_offering_id 'course_offerings.course_offering_id', crsofr.branch_id 'course_offerings.branch_id', br.name 'course_offerings.branch_name', crsofr.lecturer_id 'course_offerings.lecturer_id', lec.lecturer_id 'course_offerings.lecturer_name' from course crs join course_category cat on crs.category_id = cat.category_id join course_offering crsofr on crsofr.course_id = crs.course_id join branch br on crsofr.branch_id = br.branch_id join lecturer lec on crsofr.lecturer_id = lec.lecturer_id where crs.course_id=#{courseId}
mapper.update: update course set name=#{name}, detail=#{detail}, img_url=#{imgUrl}, category_id=#{categoryId}, release_time=#{releaseTime}, price=#{price}, status=#{status} where course_id=#{courseId}
